data.actual_result: Message box adds an empty line to the end of the message
data.expected_result: Message box is the same height as when you switched channels
data.short_description: Leaving a message in the message box that ends right before a linebreak adds an empty line to the message box
data.steps_to_repro: - Write/copy and past a message that ends right before a line break (the next character causes a new line) - Without sending the message, switch channels - Switch back to the channel you typed the message and view the message box - Note: The amount of characters needed differs depending on if you have the member list open or not
